data.name: UltrasClash V
data.description:
** THIS PRODUCT IS IN EARLY ACCESS, IT MAY CONTAIN SOME GLITCHES, because we believe that the best way to develop the game is with the help of the community**

UltrasClash V is a physics based, fast paced anime combat!!! Fight hordes of hostile and powerful enemies like cactus head policemen, stupid minionsand giant dinosaur in a desperate, yet unmistakably hilarious, fight for survival.

In Ultrasclash V the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your fighting style, choose your weapons, chose you powers. Be the powerful fighter you always dreamed of becoming!

FEATURES

üëäPunch Movement System: we created a VR locomotion system which allows you to move punching in the direction you choose to move to!

‚ö°Ô∏èSpecial Attacks: Charge up your aura to full power and unleash devastating finishing moves!

‚òÑÔ∏èPhysical engine: we bring you accurate physics feedbacks in addition to badass sounds and enemies!

ü¶æMOD KIT Support coming soon...
